sect1.title: Managing &susemgr; with spacewalk-service
sect1.para: Since &susemgr; consists of a multitude of individual components, &suse; provides the command-line tool spacewalk-service which allows you to stop, start, or retrieve status information from the various services in the appropriate order. This tool accepts all typical commands:
sect1.screen: /usr/sbin/spacewalk-service start /usr/sbin/spacewalk-service stop /usr/sbin/spacewalk-service restart /usr/sbin/spacewalk-service reload /usr/sbin/spacewalk-service enable /usr/sbin/spacewalk-service disable /usr/sbin/spacewalk-service status
sect1.para: Use spacewalk-service to shut down and bring up the entire &susemgr; and retrieve status messages from all of its services at once.
